title: Mackintosh collateral typeface
content:
Hi,

I am looking for the serif typeface used on this collateral for Mackintosh rain wear. Mrs Eaves perhaps? Just wanted to get some expert opinions :)  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191602im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marque16_6436.jpg)
